price: Twanabaremeye ibindi bisa na bwo bagenderaho.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
